thread.title: Daniel Radcliffe started masturbating before his teens!
thread.title_full: Daniel Radcliffe started masturbating before his teens!

author: Prathamesh Jadhav | India.com Entertainment Desk
title: Daniel Radcliffe started masturbating before his teens!
text:
Daniel Radcliffe started masturbating before his teens! By India.com Entertainment Desk on October 23, 2015 at 5:03 AM Comments 
As the on-screen Harry Potter, he waved his magic wand to delight the audiences. But in real life, pun definitely intended, Daniel Radcliff, learnt other things too with equal ease, when he was quite young–really young! In his interview with the notoriously popular Playboy, the 26-year-old actor talked about masturbation and the art of pleasuring himself. ALSO READ: 7 things you probably did not know about Harry Potter 
After getting those pearls of wisdom from the cutie we can’t wait to get our hands laid on Daniel’s…ahem interview! What about you fans? 
“Yeah, I was like every other teenager in that sense,” Radcliffe told Playboy, in response to a question about whether he masturbated while filming Harry Potter. “My favourite line about masturbation is Louis C.K.’s, something like ‘I found out about it when I was 11, and I didn’t skip a day.’ mashable quoted Daniel saying so. 
now if you feel that lad is quite open to talk about sexuality and subjects revolving around it. Doesn’t heel shy or embarrassed to talk about something as personal as…well masturbation. Well, Daniel did speak about that universal feeling of embarrassment and guilt when one just finishes jerking off! 
  5:22 AM
